name: @prostory/edelweiss
description: Small framework that builds HTML from JS.

scripts.build: npm run clean; rollup --config; npm run copy
scripts.copy: npm run copy:docs; npm run copy:settings; npm run copy:typings; npm run copy:license
scripts.copy:docs: cp README.md dist/; cp CHANGELOG.md dist/
scripts.release: npm run build; npm publish --access public

author: Kapelianovych Yevhen
